subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Lance Armstrong angrily denied the latest allegation that he used performance-enhancing drugs, dismissing the claims of Betsy Andreu, a former teammate's wife, that he admitted it a few days after he had brain surgery in 1996.
snippet: Lance Armstrong angrily denied the latest allegation that he used performance-enhancing drugs, dismissing the claims of Betsy Andreu, a former teammate's wife, that he admitted it a few days after he had brain surgery in 1996.
